name: Multibrand UI kit FREE token-set  2.0.1
description:
Free Ui kit

EN - Free Ui kit running the Figma Tokens plugin, suitable for products with multiple brands.

  • Color tokens in the HSL + auto saturation balance scheme
  • Anatomy tokens
  • Connecting any number of brands
  • Dark and light modifications for each brand
  • Identical component architecture

Version 2.0.1 -June 06.2022

EN - The number of pages with field components has been reduced, now the type of field can be changed via the "swap-instas" function

- Added the "üìñ component stand" page to get acquainted with the components

- Other little fixes

Version 2.0.0 -June 01.2022

EN - Simplified architecture of component layers

- Reduced the total file size from (305,154 layers / 0.56 gb) to (46,512 layers / 0.15 gb)

- Added new variants settings - Boolean, Instance swap, Text

- Added labels around option sets

- Workspace for dark modification of Figma

- Other minor edits
